original_title: Simple Ways to Boost Your Mental Health
processed_title: Simple Ways to Boost Your Mental Health
content: Posted September 15, 2020 | Reviewed by Kaja Perina Mental health is extremely important. You can see how much of an effect it has on the quality of your life. When you have a healthy mental state, you tend to be better able to deal with everyday challenges and problems. Here are some simple ways to boost your mental health. First, learn how to get out of negative thoughts. In a recent study done by psychologists at the University of Michigan, depressed and anxious people were asked to think about things that would help them cope with stress in their lives. They were asked to write down what they thought would be most useful to them. The results surprised them. Surprisingly, depressed and anxious people actually wrote more positive than negative thoughts. Instead of worrying about things in their future, they focused on things that would happen in the present. This is because their minds do not have the same connection with the present that others do. For example, when someone thinks about a job interview, they immediately have an image of what will be going on in the interview. Second, focus on positive thoughts. You can do this by imagining yourself living the life that you want. Then imagine that you have reached that goal. Now imagine how you will feel once you reach it. Once you're feeling good about your future, focus on what your present situation is like. How is the weather? Are your finances in order? Third, change your thinking. This is a skill that many people do not practice on a regular basis. You can start by thinking positive thoughts all the time. If your current thinking is negative, then switch to positive thoughts. Fourth, take a walk. Exercise is often a great way to change your attitude. A walk can help you de-stress, relax, and give you a sense of accomplishment. Once you're feeling good about yourself, you will begin to notice the positive changes in the world around you. If you can think positively, you will find that you have more happiness, more success, and more peace in your life. These are four simple ways to boost your mental health. They are not magical cures, but they can help you become more confident in all areas of your life. Stress is one of the leading causes of depression and anxiety. By managing stress you can keep the anxiety at bay, reduce your depression, and improve your mental health. Exercise is another way to manage stress. Walking helps you to release endorphins, which are the feel-good hormones that you experience during exercise. Walking can also help you burn calories, which helps you feel good. Meditation is another great tool to use to keep stress at bay. Meditation can help you connect with your body and the universe around you. Meditation helps you to release all the negative energy and negative thoughts that accumulate around you. Once you learn how to manage stress, you will find that you have more energy and better vitality in every area of your life. Stress can be managed with these simple tips. Stress affects everyone differently, so it's important that you learn to manage stress as best as you can. You'll find that you are happier, healthier, and more successful if you learn to take care of yourself. These methods help you boost your mental health are easy to implement once you understand how stressful things in life affect us. If you practice a positive outlook all the time, you will find that you are less stressed. And happier. When you focus on the things that are good, you will become less worried about the things that aren't so good, and thus, less stressed. Negative thoughts will accumulate. These simple ways to boost your mental health can help you to become more relaxed and happy. This will in turn make you more productive in your life. Sarah-Len Mutiwasekwa is a mental health advocate whose efforts are invested in breaking the stigma around talk...
summary: Kesehatan mental sangat penting karena memengaruhi kualitas hidup dan kemampuan seseorang menghadapi tantangan sehari-hari. Artikel ini menyajikan beberapa cara sederhana untuk meningkatkan kesehatan mental. Salah satu langkah utama adalah menghentikan pola pikir negatif. Penelitian dari University of Michigan menunjukkan bahwa orang yang mengalami depresi atau kecemasan sebenarnya menuliskan pikiran positif lebih banyak daripada negatif, karena mereka fokus pada hal-hal yang terjadi saat ini, bukan ke depan. Dengan memperhatikan keadaan sekarang—seperti cuaca atau keadaan keuangan—seseorang dapat membangun rasa percaya diri. Selanjutnya, penting untuk memfokuskan pikiran pada hal-hal positif, seperti membayangkan hidup yang diinginkan dan merasakan perasaan bahagia saat mencapainya. Ini membantu membangun harapan dan kepercayaan diri. Selain itu, perubahan pola pikir harus dilatih secara rutin, dengan beralih dari pikiran negatif ke positif. Aktivitas fisik seperti berjalan-jalan juga sangat membantu. Berjalan dapat mengurangi stres, memperbaiki suasana hati, dan memberikan rasa pencapaian. Dengan mempraktikkan pikiran positif dan aktivitas fisik, seseorang akan lebih mudah melihat kebaikan di lingkungan sekitar. Dalam konteks Islam, prinsip tazkiyatun nufus (perbaikan jiwa) juga mendukung hal ini, karena menekankan pentingnya memelihara kebaikan dalam pikiran dan perbuatan. Dengan memperbaiki cara berpikir dan memperkuat kepercayaan diri, seseorang dapat mencapai keseimbangan mental dan kebahagiaan sejati. (198 kata)
